title: RepRadar
shortDescription: A comprehensive tool for tracking congressional representatives and current executive orders.
fullDescription: RepRadar is a full-stack web application that helps citizens stay informed about their congressional representatives. Users can search for representatives by location, and view the most recent executive orders. Built with a focus on civic engagement, transparency, and user experience.
motivation: Inspired by the need for greater civic engagement and transparency in government, RepRadar makes it easy for everyday citizens to understand current executire orders and find representatives to contact
features: Real-time representative lookup by zip code
Up to date executive orders and ai generated summaries

challenges.challenge: Integrating multiple government APIs with inconsistent data formats
challenges.solution: Built a data normalization layer to standardize information from different sources
Implemented pagination, caching, and database indexing strategies

challenges.challenge: Finding an API that provided up to date summaries of each executive order
challenges.solution: Created AI data scraper to create summaries as each detailed view loaded in

title: Tracker
tagline: Organize your job search, one connection at a time
shortDescription: A comprehensive job hunt tracking application for managing contacts, companies, and applications.
fullDescription: A full-stack job search management application designed to help users stay organized throughout their job hunt. Features include contact management, company tracking, application progress monitoring, and relationship mapping between contacts, companies, and applications. The app helps users maintain meaningful connections while keeping track of their entire job search pipeline.
motivation: After experiencing the chaos of managing hundreds of applications, contacts, and company research during my own job search, I wanted to create a centralized tool that connects all the pieces of the job hunt process.
features: Contact management with notes and interaction history
Company profiles with interest levels and research notes
Application tracking with customizable status stages
Network mapping connecting contacts to companies and applications
Visual pipeline dashboard showing application progress

challenges.challenge: Designing a relational data model that connects contacts, companies, and applications
challenges.solution: Implemented a flexible schema with junction tables to support many-to-many relationships

challenges.challenge: Creating an intuitive interface for complex relationship mapping
challenges.solution: Built interactive visualizations showing connections between entities with clear visual hierarchies

title: Personal Portfolio
tagline: Showcasing my work with modern web tech
shortDescription: This portfolio website built with Angular and modern web technologies.
fullDescription: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience. Built with Angular 19 and featuring server-side rendering, custom reusable components, a clean design system using SCSS variables, and dynamic content loading. Demonstrates proficiency in modern web development practices and attention to detail.
motivation: To create a professional online presence that showcases both my technical skills and design sensibility.
features: Server-side rendering for better SEO and performance
Fully responsive design across all devices
Dynamic content loading from JSON files

challenges.solution: Used platform detection and conditional rendering
